home_welcome_subtitle: Discover authentic Sierra Leonean products from local sellers
help_support_subtitle: Find answers to common questions or contact support
faq_how_to_buy: How do I buy a product?
faq_how_to_buy_answer: Select a product, add to cart and checkout.
faq_payment_methods_answer: We accept cash, mobile money, and card payments.
contact_chat_message: Our support team will reply shortly.
about_description: SLEM is Sierra Leone's premier marketplace app, connecting buyers and sellers with authentic products and seamless experiences.
our_mission: To provide a safe and seamless marketplace for all Sierra Leoneans.
our_vision: To be the most trusted online marketplace in Sierra Leone.
two_factor_auth_help: Add an extra layer of security to your account by enabling 2FA.

about.title: About SLEM
about.description1: SLEM is a modern digital marketplace built to empower commerce in Sierra Leone and beyond.
about.description2: We connect buyers and sellers through a secure, transparent, and easy-to-use platform.
about.missionText: To empower buyers and sellers by providing a reliable marketplace that supports growth, transparency, and economic opportunity.
about.visionText: To become the leading digital commerce platform in West Africa enabling millions of people to buy, sell, and grow with confidence
about.valuesText: Trust, fairness, and innovation guide everything we build. we focus on user safety, honest transactions, and continuous improvement to deliver long-term value to our community.
about.founderText: SLEM was founded to empower local businesses through technology.
